page.title: 14RECREATION FOR PETROCKSTOWE
page.content: Favourites are{hunting, shooting & {fishing,}most popular (with 9 horses) following the hunt as spectator or participant. The{Stevenstone Hunt}goes out 3 times a week, often meeting in the village,& over 40 riders, adults & children & 80+ spectators may attend an opening meet.Walking,fishing,shoot- ing & riding are equally next in popu- larity, with indoor sports of{badmin- {ton & darts}next. 27 active sports are followed, but there are no sports facilities here so players number 2's & 3's only for hockey, netball, bowls etc. Swimming is the best supported facility sport, involving 8% in travel to the Torrington pool.By far the most popular hobby is{gardening,}accounting for 64% of interest; needlecrafts are 37%, photography 17%. 23 different hobbies are pursued, ranging from beekeeping to pottery.
